title: EC Gold – Snow
content:
Newcastle based singer songwriter EC Gold announces his arrival with the deeply emotive, Snow.

Showcasing his stunning vocal, and his articulate way with impactful lyrics, it documents the turmoil in realising that a relationship is coming to an end. Produced by Carey Willetts (formerly of Athlete, now collaborator for Dermot Kennedy), it’s an exciting and stirring first offering, ahead of his debut headline show in Newcastle at the end of this month. Check it out below.
